value:
All I wished was to be ever at His
Highness's side...until the very end.
Even now, those feelings linger...

Bern is the mightiest of all nations.
Even defeated, we shall rise again...
as surely as my heart still beats.

The fatigue is clear on your face.
Why not rest a while? I can prepare
some refreshments for you...

To summon Heroes from other
worlds is a fearsome power... Beyond
even that of the Dark Priestess...

A great general must be always
learning. Complacency is the path
to defeat... Dedication is key.

Allow me to introduce myself. I am
Brunnya. I am at your service.

No foe can stand against
Bern's finest!

Such growth is expected for one in
service of His Highness. Anything
less would be shameful.

Forgive me, Highness... Overlook
my weakness...

You can trust that my every effort is
at your disposal.

I am Brunnya, a Wyvern General of
Bern in service of His Highness,
Zephiel. Watch as I lay low our foes.

Your command style is quite...unusual
to me, $Nu.$k$pCompared to the Bern's standard, it
feels...loose. And vulnerable.$k$pAnd yet, you make a habit of victory.
Bern was strong...yet was defeated.
Perhaps yours is the superior way?$k$pI admit seeing faults in our strategy,
but one does not halt when the pride
of Bern's might drives you forward.$k$pAs His Highness's general, I did what
I believe to be right, but perhaps
there was another way...$k$pIt is a weighty mantle you bear, meant
for only the strongest of us. Yet...you
carry it well, $Nu.
はいっ
せやあ！
くっ…
しまった…！
Finally—a test!
I won't give in!
Bern will triumph!
I will face my fate.
Your Highness...
*plotting laugh*
I am Brunnya, Wyvern General of Bern.
Are you trying to display...friendship?
Bern is the mightiest nation in the land. For us to lose is...unthinkable.
Why does His Highness place such faith in the Dark Priestess...? How can he trust her?
There are many paths one might take in life. You have chosen your own path, as I have chosen mine.
Your Highness, Zephiel... Please let me be at your side again...like before...
It seems my path runs alongside yours for now. Mind if we walk together?
Yes?
As you say.
By your will.
